prompt: <description>**Part 1: Hexagonal Prism with Cylindrical Hole** You will construct a three-dimensional, geometric shape with a hollow center, resembling a hexagonal prism with a cylindrical hole through its center. 1. **Create a new coordinate system:** - Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Set the Translation vector to [0.0, 0.2168, 0.0] 2. **Draw the 2D sketch for the hexagonal prism:** - Sketch a hexagon on the X-Y plane with the following points: - Point (0.0, 0.545) - Point (0.0202, 0.17) - Point (0.355, 0.0) - Point (0.6697, 0.205) - Point (0.6495, 0.58) - Point (0.3147, 0.75) - Connect the points in order to form a closed loop. 3. **Draw the 2D sketch for the cylindrical hole:** - Sketch a circle centered at (0.3349, 0.375) with radius 0.2168. 4. **Scale the 2D sketch:** - Scale the sketches by a factor of 0.75. 5. **Transform the sketches into 3D:** - Apply the euler angles [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector [0.0, 0.2168, 0.0] to create the 3D sketches. 6. **Extrude the 3D sketches:** - Extrude the hexagonal prism sketch by a depth of 0.2168 towards the normal. - Extrude the cylindrical hole sketch by a depth of 0.2168 towards the normal. 7. **Combine the extrusions:** - Perform a boolean operation to combine the extrusions, forming a hollow shape with a hexagonal prism and a cylindrical hole through its center. The length and width of the hexagonal prism are both 0.75 meters, while the height is 0.75 meters. The radius of the cylindrical hole is 0.2168 meters.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.2168,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.545],"End Point":[0.0202,0.17]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.0202,0.17],"End Point":[0.355,0.0]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.355,0.0],"End Point":[0.6697,0.205]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.6697,0.205],"End Point":[0.6495,0.58]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.6495,0.58],"End Point":[0.3147,0.75]},"line_6":{"Start Point":[0.3147,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.545]}},"loop_2":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.3349,0.375],"Radius":0.2168}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.2168,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
